review: High wait time of more than 1 hour. Practo appointment was given no priority at all. Saw many patients cutting queue. When I checked with the staff, they informed me that some of the patients just wanted to go inside to show report. But everyone was taking lot of time. My kid who was down with viral fever had to bear all the pain. Hospital is also charging Rs.400/- instead of Rs.300/-. Though I raised this issue, billing staff was adamant. Doctor was still good and looked friendly.
Had our doubts cleared satisfactorily. The doctor spoke with us generously in spite of his busy schedule. Good experience!
Friendly doc. Explained the issue clearly & spends good amount of time in discussing. Overall good experience. Highly recommended.

I know him for 6 years now. Consulting him from 2015 for both my sons. Such a nice and soft spoken person. He always keeps his calm and answer all the questions clearly. You will remember him forever, after your first visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very soft in handling my kid..... Such a diwn to earth doctor i have ever met..... Very satisfying treatment.....

review: He is very helpful and quick response his quick treatment help my kid to recover soon .. very much satisfied with his treatment ..

Doctor was very humble and friendly. Was listening patiently the problems of patient.

Waiting time was high even we took online appointment, and consulting charge also taken higher as compared to what mentioned in the site.
